## Step-by-Step

üßæ Click the Threads button to view all active conversation threads.

üîç Click on a thread to see all messages and replies grouped together.

‚úèÔ∏è Type your response in the input area to contribute to the conversation.

:video{src="/threads.mp4" class="rounded-md object-cover w-full h-full" controls autoplay muted loop}
::


### üí°Tips

* Use threads to follow ongoing conversations without losing track of related messages.

* Pin important threads to quickly access key discussions.
